entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
